abstract: Verizon still wants to sell Apple’s iPhone, said the company’s chief executive, as he discussed the phone company’s better-than-expected earnings.
snippet: Verizon still wants to sell Apple’s iPhone, said the company’s chief executive, as he discussed the phone company’s better-than-expected earnings.
lead_paragraph: It seems that Ivan Seidenberg thinks Steve Jobs has a thick skin.

headline.main: Droid or Not, Verizon Still Wants the iPhone
